snippet: The team unveiled a new sign in left field in honor of Gary Carter, who died in February, and all the current players wore his No. 8 shirt during pregame warm-ups.
abstract: New York Mets hold pregame tribute to former catcher Gary Carter, who died of brain cancer in February; during the ceremony, Carter's family members unveil sign in left field in his honor.
lead_paragraph: The team unveiled a new sign in left field in honor of Gary Carter, who died in February, and all the current players wore his No. 8 shirt during pregame warm-ups.

headline.seo: Mets Pay Tribute to Carter in Opener
headline.main: At Home, the Mets Pay Tribute to Carter
headline.print_headline: At Home, The Mets Pay Tribute To Carter
